channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report E-2023100680
item.description:
Report E-2023100680

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO CNW, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Due to a forklift puncture during the loading process, the body of the drum became compromised and released approximately 8-gallons of product onto the trailer floor while in transit. A Contractor cleaned the released and transferred the remaining product into a new drum. The damaged, empty drum was overpacked for disposal. No storm drains, waterways, or soil were impacted.
